name: Cuteness Arises
description:
Cuteness Arises

Welcome to my moon patrol reboot game. It is a visual recreation of the old MOON PATROL game. It was made for an school project in 2 weeks,  using c++ and raylib. We also had to FORK a classmate project so it is half done by me and half done by my classmate Facundo.

Hope you like it! :)

Credits

Game Development

Facundo Santos (https://feco-games.itch.io/)

Nicolas Ramos Marin (https://nicorm.itch.io/)

Game Art inspired by wallpaperflare (no artist mentioned on the web)

https://www.wallpaperflare.com/pixel-sunset-wallpaper-wallpaper-185630
